properties.entry: SELECT * FROM events
SELECT events.*,places.* FROM events,places WHERE events.id_place = places.id_place
SELECT events.*, places.*, museum.* FROM events, places, museum WHERE events.id_place = places.id_place AND places.id_place=museum.id_place
SELECT events.*, places.*, zoo.* FROM events, places, zoo WHERE events.id_place = places.id_place AND places.id_place=zoo.id_place
SELECT events.*, places.*, park.* FROM events, places, park WHERE events.id_place = places.id_place AND places.id_place=park.id_place
SELECT events.*, places.*, theater.* FROM events, places, theater WHERE events.id_place = places.id_place AND places.id_place=theater.id_place
SELECT events.*, places.*, stadium.* FROM events, places, stadium WHERE events.id_place = places.id_place AND places.id_place=stadium.id_place
SELECT events.*, places.*,large_business.* FROM events, places, large_business WHERE events.id_place = places.id_place AND places.id_place=large_business.id_place
SELECT events.*, places.*, tourist_attraction.* FROM events, places, tourist_attraction WHERE events.id_place = places.id_place AND places.id_place=tourist_attraction.id_place
SELECT events.*, places.*, traditional_market.* FROM events, places, traditional_market WHERE events.id_place = places.id_place AND places.id_place=traditional_market.id_place

select users.id from users where users.username = ? and users.password =?
update users set password = ? where id = ?
update users set firstname = ?, lastname = ?, dni = ?, email = ?, phone_number = ?, address = ? where id_user = ?;
SELECT id_user FROM users WHERE email= ? OR username = ?;
INSERT INTO users (id_user, username, password, firstname, lastname, dni, email, phone_number, address, is_admin) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?);
INSERT INTO events_users (id_events_users,id_event, id_user) values(?, ?, ?);
DELETE FROM id_events_users WHERE id_event = ? AND id_user = ?;
DELETE FROM id_events_users WHERE id_event = ?;
SELECT id_events_users, id_event, id_user FROM events_users WHERE id_event = ? AND id_visitor = ?;

SELECT id_event, name_event, description_event, start_event, end_event, type_event, ticket_price, seats_available, seats_total, id_place FROM events WHERE id_events_users IN (SELECT id_event FROM events_users WHERE id_visitor = ?);
SELECT value FROM sequencer WHERE name = ?;

SELECT events.*, traditionalmarket.* FROM events, events_places, traditionalmarket WHERE events.id = events_places.event_id AND events_places.placetypeid = 7 AND events_places.place_id = traditionalmarket.placeId
select id_user from users where username = ? and password =?
update users set password = ? where id_user = ?
update users set firstname = ?, lastname = ?, dni = ?, email = ?, phone_number = ?, address = ? where id_user = ?
SELECT id_user FROM users WHERE email= ? OR username = ?

INSERT INTO events_users (id_events_users,id_event, id_user) values(?, ?, ?)

DELETE FROM id_events_users WHERE id_event = ?
SELECT id_events_users, id_event, id_user FROM events_users WHERE id_event = ? AND id_visitor = ?

SELECT id_event, name_event, description_event, start_event, end_event, type_event, ticket_price, seats_available, seats_total, id_place FROM events WHERE id_events_users IN (SELECT id_event FROM events_users WHERE id_visitor = ?)
update users set password = ? "+" where id = ?
update users set firstname = ? "+" lastname = ? "+" dni = ? "+" email = ? "+" phonenumber = ? "+" adress = ? "+"where id = ?;
INSERT INTO places (image) VALUES (?) WHERE placeId = ?
UPDATE places SET image = ? "+" WHERE placeId = ?
